taxonomicnotes: Possibly conspecific with A. steveni Meyer, Riehl & Zetzsche, 1987 (Konings 1995).
rationale: Endemic to Lake Malawi. Widespread with no known major threats to the whole population.
evaluator: Snoeks, J. (Freshwater Fish Red List Authority) & Darwall, W. (Freshwater Biodiversity Assessment Programme)
